subs.text: @onthemainline One Seder I offered four explanations for the orange on our plate. One was a Zionist reference to Jaffa oranges. One was this historically accurate explanation. One drew on Tu b’shvat klipa ideas. Can’t remember the fourth at the moment. Maybe a glass of wine would help…

subs.text: @Yair_Rosenberg @FoxmanAbraham The journalistic conventions of approaching every main character with a presumption of good faith makes de facto cancellation the easiest course for a reporter and editor for whom an Alice Walker appearance is supposed to be an easy story.
